ollama_description.message: Ollama lets you run open-source large language models locally on your machine. Configure Ollama to use it with Overlay.

ollama_installation_description.message: First, install Ollama on your computer

ollama_installation_instructions.message: Visit the official Ollama website and follow the installation instructions for your operating system:

ollama_pulling_models_title.description: Title for Ollama model pulling section

ollama_pulling_models_description.description: Description for Ollama model pulling section
ollama_pulling_models_description.message: Download models you want to use

ollama_pulling_models_instructions.message: Use the following command to download a model. For example, to download Llama 3:

ollama_other_models.description: Information about other available Ollama models
ollama_other_models.message: Other popular models include: mistral, gemma, mixtral, phi, orca-mini, and many more.

ollama_view_model_library.description: Label for link to view Ollama model library

ollama_serve_title.message: Running Ollama with Chrome Extension Support

ollama_serve_description.message: Critical step: Run Ollama with special flags to allow the extension to connect

ollama_important_note.message: IMPORTANT: You must run Ollama with the OLLAMA_ORIGINS environment variable for Chrome extension support!

ollama_serve_instructions.message: Use this command to start Ollama with extension support:

ollama_serve_info.description: Information about the Ollama serve command
ollama_serve_info.message: This command allows the extension to connect to your local Ollama server. Keep this terminal window open while using Ollama with Overlay.

ollama_further_help.description: Text for getting further help with Ollama
ollama_further_help.message: For more help, visit the Ollama documentation at

ollama_available_models.description: Title for available Ollama models section

ollama_models_description.message: Models detected from your Ollama server

no_ollama_models.description: Message shown when no Ollama models are detected
no_ollama_models.message: No Ollama models detected. Make sure Ollama is running with the correct flags.
